se.hig.oodp.lab.model

Class Vertex2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.oodp.lab.model.Vertex2D

  • public class Vertex2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for modeling vertices. A vertex represents a position in the cartesian 2D-space. It is an abstract concept and cannot be visualized.
    Version:
    2015-04-15
    Author:
    Peter Jenke, Peter.Jenke@hig.se

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex2D(double x, double y)
      Creates a new instance of Vertex2D at the position with coordinates x and y.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double dist(Vertex2D v)
      Returns the distance of this position to the position given by v.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      double getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of this vertex.
      double getY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of this vertex.
      Vertex2D moveBy(double d_x, double d_y)
      Returns a new vertex that is moved by d_x and d_y from the original position.
      Vertex2D moveTo(double x, double y)
      Returns a new vertex at the coordinates x and y.
      Vertex2D rotate(Vertex2D center, double angle)
      Computes a new position by rotating the actual position around the center given by Vertex c in mathematically positive direction by angle (given in degree).
      Vertex2D scale(Vertex2D center, double factor_x, double factor_y)
      Computes a new position by scaling the actual position with reference position given by Vertex c.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string-representation of this vertex.

      • moveBy

        public Vertex2D moveBy(double d_x,
                       double d_y)
        Returns a new vertex that is moved by d_x and d_y from the original position.
        Parameters:
        d_x - - moving distance in x-direction
        d_y - - moving distance in y-direction
        Returns:
        vertex at position (x + d_x, y + d_y)

      • rotate

        public Vertex2D rotate(Vertex2D center,
                       double angle)
        Computes a new position by rotating the actual position around the center given by Vertex c in mathematically positive direction by angle (given in degree). After rotation, the method returns a new instance of Vertex at the new position. The method does not change the position of this instance.
        Parameters:
        center - Vertex representing the rotation center
        angle - rotation angle given in degree in CCW
        Returns:
        new instance of Vertex with position after rotation

      • scale

        public Vertex2D scale(Vertex2D center,
                      double factor_x,
                      double factor_y)
        Computes a new position by scaling the actual position with reference position given by Vertex c. After scaling, the method returns a new instance of Vertex at the new position. The method does not change the position of this instance.
        Parameters:
        center - Vertex representing the reference position
        factor_x - scaling factor in x-direction
        factor_y - scaling factor in y-direction
        Returns:
        new instance of Vertex with position after scaling

      • dist

        public double dist(Vertex2D v)
        Returns the distance of this position to the position given by v.
        Parameters:
        v - - vertex
        Returns:
        distance from this vertex to v
